remarks: Extending a one-based mapping by adding a tuple at the end results in another mapping.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-May-2015.)
statement:
mapfzcons.1 $e |- M = ( N + 1 ) $.
mapfzcons $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ A e. ( B ^m ( 1 ... N ) ) /\ C e. B ) -> ( A u. { <. M , C >. } ) e. ( B ^m ( 1 ... M ) ) ) $.
